body_html:
The bug also occurs when trying to use https://github.com/lmb-freiburg/hand3d, with tensorflow 1.11 and python 3.6.6 (anaconda).

@mas-dse-greina :

So try just 'conda install -c ananconda tensorflow'. And see if it works

The user anaconda does not seem to exist any longer, the command fails with 404

Update: It works when installing tensorflow with pip instead of anaconda.

body:
The bug also occurs when trying to use https://github.com/lmb-freiburg/hand3d, with tensorflow 1.11 and python 3.6.6 (anaconda).

@mas-dse-greina : 
> So try just 'conda install -c ananconda tensorflow'. And see if it works

The user anaconda does not seem to exist any longer, the command fails with 404

Update: It works when installing tensorflow with pip instead of anaconda.
